      Benchmarks sorting time but does not modify the shapes field.

      Executes one of the sorting algorithms in Sort.java based on the -s or -S option.
      private java.util.Comparator<Shape> getComparator()
      Returns a comparator object based on the -t or -T option: H -> naturalOrder() (by height, as shape implements Comparable) A -> BaseAreaCompare V -> VolumeCompare

      Maps the compareType char to the type of comparison.

      Maps the sortType char to a descriptive name.

      private void printKeySortedElements(Shape[] sortedShapes)
      Prints the first, every 1000th, and last shapes (by sorted order).

      Runs sorting and prints the results along with benchmarking time.
      private void sortShapes()
      Performs sorting but does not measure time (sorting only).

      Utility to remove leading or trailing quotes from a string.

    • Method Detail

      • runSorting

        private void runSorting()
        Runs sorting and prints the results along with benchmarking time.

      • sortShapes

        private void sortShapes()
        Performs sorting but does not measure time (sorting only).

      • benchmarkSorting

        public double benchmarkSorting()
        Benchmarks sorting time but does not modify the shapes field.
        Returns:
        the elapsed time in milliseconds, or -1 if sorting fails

      • printKeySortedElements

        private void printKeySortedElements(Shape[] sortedShapes)
        Prints the first, every 1000th, and last shapes (by sorted order).
        Parameters:
        sortedShapes - the sorted array of shapes

      • printFormattedOutput

        private void printFormattedOutput(java.lang.String index,
                                  Shape shape)

      • getComparator

        private java.util.Comparator<Shape> getComparator()
        Returns a comparator object based on the -t or -T option: H -> naturalOrder() (by height, as shape implements Comparable) A -> BaseAreaCompare V -> VolumeCompare
        Returns:
        the Comparator for Shape, or null if an unknown type is provided

      • executeSort

        private void executeSort(Shape[] arr,
                         java.util.Comparator<Shape> comparator)
        Executes one of the sorting algorithms in Sort.java based on the -s or -S option.
        Parameters:
        arr - the array of shapes to sort
        comparator - the comparator to use for sorting

      • getSortName

        private java.lang.String getSortName(char sortType)
        Maps the sortType char to a descriptive name.
        Parameters:
        sortType - the sorting method character
        Returns:
        the name of the sorting algorithm

      • getComparisonType

        private java.lang.String getComparisonType()
        Maps the compareType char to the type of comparison.
        Returns:
        the comparison type as a String

      • getShapeComparisonValue

        private double getShapeComparisonValue(Shape shape)
        Retrieves the relevant numeric value based on compareType.
        Parameters:
        shape - the Shape from which to retrieve the value
        Returns:
        the numeric value for comparison

      • stripQuotes

        private java.lang.String stripQuotes(java.lang.String s)
        Utility to remove leading or trailing quotes from a string. For example, "\"C:\\temp\\shapes1.txt\"" => "C:\temp\shapes1.txt"
        Parameters:
        s - the string potentially containing quotes
        Returns:
        the string with leading and trailing quotes removed
